objectives.title: Compare and contrast various types of security controls.
Summarize fundamental security concepts.
Explain the importance of change management processes and controls.
Explain the importance of using cryptographic solutions.
Explain the importance of physical security.
Explain the importance of resilience and recovery in security architecture.
Compare and contrast common threat actors and motivations.
Explain common threat vectors and attack surfaces.
Explain common vulnerabilities and exploit techniques.
Analyze indicators of malicious activity.
Compare and contrast secure architecture concepts.
Apply security principles to enterprise infrastructure.
Compare and contrast concepts and strategies to protect data.
Explain resilience and environmental design considerations.
Apply common security techniques to computing resources.
Explain security implications of asset management.
Troubleshoot common security issues.
Explain security alerting and monitoring concepts.
Modify enterprise capabilities to enhance security.
Implement and maintain identity and access management.
Explain automation and orchestration in security operations.
Explain and execute incident response activities.
Compare and contrast governance, risk, and compliance concepts.
Explain elements of the risk management process.
Explain third-party risk assessment and management.
Summarize elements of effective security compliance.
Explain types and purposes of security audits and assessments.
Implement security awareness practices.
Explain privacy and sensitive data concepts.
